title: Another leaverbuster...
body:
I was playing a ranked game and suddenly I started getting fps drops and then my whole game stopped and I couldn't move, Alt+Esc or Ctrl+Alt+Delete. I restarted my pc and when I re-opened league it said that I was still in a match but there wasn't any reconnect button. I again restarted my pc and client multiple times and I couldn't reconnect. Now i am stuck with another leaver for 20 mins.

Pls help- Jacca

btw this was in my promos ;(
